description: Validated cross-category drug repurposing patterns from h191 analysis and literature validation
validation_method: Literature search via PubMed, FDA approvals, clinical guidelines

patterns.mechanism: Statins lower LDL cholesterol and reduce cardiovascular risk in metabolic syndrome patients
evidence: Statins are standard of care for cardiovascular risk reduction in diabetes (ADA Standards 2024)
SGLT2 inhibitors + statins are first-line for cardiometabolic disease
Fibrates reduce triglycerides in metabolic syndrome

patterns.mechanism: Anti-inflammatory effects independent of antimicrobial activity; modulates cytokines, reduces neutrophil infiltration
evidence: NEJM 2011: Azithromycin reduces COPD exacerbations by 27%
Azithromycin inhibits MUC5AC via ERK1/2 pathway
Subantibiotic doses have anti-inflammatory effects

patterns.mechanism: Anti-inflammatory effects on airway inflammation; standard treatment for asthma and COPD exacerbations
evidence: Corticosteroids are guideline-recommended for asthma and COPD
Multiple ATC codes (H, D, S) due to different formulations

patterns.mechanism: Originally for diabetes, now first-line for heart failure due to cardiorenal benefits
evidence: EMPA-REG OUTCOME: 35% reduction in HF hospitalization
Empagliflozin (Jardiance) FDA approved for HFrEF and HFpEF
CREDENCE, DAPA-CKD trials showed cardiorenal benefits
Wegovy (semaglutide) FDA approved for CV risk reduction (March 2024)

patterns.mechanism: Anti-inflammatory effects via MMP inhibition, cytokine modulation; treats acne and rosacea
evidence: Doxycycline 40mg FDA approved for rosacea
Inhibits cathelicidin pathway, MMPs, neutrophil chemotaxis
Reduces IL-1beta, IL-6, TNF-alpha via NF-KB pathway

patterns.mechanism: H1 receptor blockade reduces pruritus in urticaria and atopic dermatitis
evidence: Cetirizine effective for urticaria and atopic eczema pruritus
Fexofenadine 120mg shows moderate benefit in atopic dermatitis
Standard treatment for chronic spontaneous urticaria

patterns.mechanism: Anti-inflammatory effects on skin inflammation; used for severe dermatological conditions
evidence: Systemic corticosteroids used for severe eczema, psoriasis flares
Bridge therapy while disease-modifying agents take effect

patterns.mechanism: Nerve block for pain management in autoimmune conditions; NOT disease-modifying
evidence: Lidocaine patch used for localized pain in arthritis
Intra-articular lidocaine abolishes peripheral nociceptive input
Not indicated as disease-modifying therapy

patterns.mechanism: Keratolytic and anti-inflammatory effects; used in psoriasis (autoimmune skin disease)
evidence: Salicylic acid is first-line for psoriasis scales
Topical corticosteroids are mainstay of psoriasis treatment
Psoriasis is classified as autoimmune

patterns.mechanism: Reduces inflammation in severe infections; used adjunctively with antimicrobials
evidence: Dexamethasone reduces mortality in severe COVID-19 (RECOVERY trial)
Corticosteroids used in bacterial meningitis to reduce inflammation
Must be combined with appropriate antimicrobial therapy

patterns.mechanism: PET imaging agent for cancer staging; detects metabolically active tumors
evidence: FDG-PET is standard for cancer staging and monitoring
Detects increased glucose metabolism in malignancies

usage_instructions.confidence_scoring: Predictions matching high-confidence patterns can receive precision boost
usage_instructions.filters: Patterns marked SYMPTOMATIC_ONLY should not boost disease-modifying predictions
usage_instructions.updates: Add new patterns as validated through research
